info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 8 at 3:55PM EDT until June 8 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh PA
info.description:
TORPBZ
The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... West Central Allegheny County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Northeastern Washington County in southwestern Pennsylvania...
* Until 430 PM EDT.
* At 355 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over McDonald, or 7 miles northwest of Canonsburg, moving east at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Upper St. Clair, Scott Township, Robinson Township, Carnegie, Crafton, Bridgeville, McDonald, Sturgeon-Noblestown, Oakdale, Heidelberg, Thornburg, Rosslyn Farms, South Fayette Township and Collier Township.
info.instruction:
Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
Highway overpasses are not safe shelters. If you cannot safely drive away from the tornado, as a last resort, abandon your vehicle and lie down in a low lying area and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 4:30 PM EDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 4:30 PM EDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 8 at 3:55PM EDT until June 8 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh PA
info.description:

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 4:30 PM EDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 4:30 PM EDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
